attr.title: OpenRA
attr.desc: OpenRA is an open source project that recreates and modernizes classic real time strategy games, like Red Alert, Command & Conquer, and Dune 2000.
attr.inst: The installer automatically takes care of setting up the game. The port comes bundled with Tiberian Dawn (Command & Conquer), Dune 2000 and Red Alert from OpenRA, the Hard Vacuum mod from OpenHV, and the Generals Alpha mod from Mustafa Alperen Seki. When you run a mod for the first time, the game offers to automatically download the free version of the game assets, or you can use the original game disks.
